Name: JK_VariantsCAB
Description: Making use of the Community Asset Bundle, this folder collects all the 3025-ish era variants for Vanilla in one place - includes Warhammer, Archer, Rifleman, Phoenix Hawk, Wolfhound, Urbie R50, Assassin, Javelin, Marauder, Marauder II, Charger, Champion, Longbow, Nightstar.  It then adds in the DC/Command Console variants for the Warhammer & Marauder, along with 'Mechs from the TRO 3028 such as Linesman, Jayhawker, Nightstar and Loader King variants - along with the Trooper.  Also includes the MASH truck with special missions.
Author: Bloody Doves, Colobos, Solahma Joe, Haree78, B4ckF1sh & Justin Kase
Contact: message me at Nexus or Paradox sites
